        Parameters:
        body - Body to add fixture to.
        vertexes - Vertexes of the fixture.
        phys - Physical attributes of the body.
        category - Category bits of the fixture.
        mask - Collision mask of the fixture.
        sensor - True if the fixture is a sensor.
